# ANC_Simulator

This is the code repository of the Shiny app (<https://pkm304.shinyapps.io/NSCLC_neut/>) from our paper "A Pharmacometric Model to Predict Chemotherapy-Induced Myelosuppression and Associated Risk Factors in Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer" published in Pharmaceutics (<https://doi.org/10.3390/pharmaceutics14050914>).
